statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_sop;
SELECT sop_name, sop_description FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE sop_id = 1;
SELECT sop_name, last_updated FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sop_description FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE sop_name LIKE '%assembly%';
SELECT sop_id, sop_name, created_at FROM manufacturing_sop ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT sop_name, sop_description FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE sop_id = 1;
SELECT sop_name, last_updated FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE sop_name LIKE '%process%';
SELECT sop_id, sop_name, created_at FROM manufacturing_sop ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sop_name, last_updated FROM manufacturing_sop WHERE sop_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM procedures;
SELECT procedure_name, created_date FROM procedures ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name FROM procedures WHERE procedure_id = 1;
SELECT step_description FROM steps WHERE procedure_id = 1 ORDER BY step_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM steps WHERE step_id < 5 AND procedure_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM procedures WHERE procedure_id = 1;
SELECT procedure_name FROM procedures WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT procedure_id, procedure_name, created_date FROM procedures ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT procedure_id, COUNT(step_id) AS total_steps FROM steps GROUP BY procedure_id;
SELECT procedure_name, step_description FROM procedures JOIN steps ON procedures.procedure_id = steps.procedure_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_id, process_description FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM sop_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sop_updates WHERE template_id = 2 ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT update_id, update_description, update_date FROM sop_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_processes;
SELECT process_id, process_description FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_name FROM sop_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT update_id, template_id, update_description FROM sop_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sop_templates INNER JOIN sop_updates ON sop_templates.template_id = sop_updates.template_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process;
SELECT id, process_name, created_at FROM manufacturing_process ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT process_name, description FROM manufacturing_process WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SOP_category WHERE category_name LIKE '%production%';
SELECT doc_name, doc_description FROM SOP_document ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_process WHERE process_name = 'Assembly' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, process_name, description FROM manufacturing_process WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND updated_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT doc_name, category_name FROM SOP_document INNER JOIN SOP_category ON SOP_document.category_id = SOP_category.id WHERE category_name = 'Quality Control'
SELECT * FROM SOP_revision WHERE created_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY revision_date DESC
SELECT id, process_name, created_at FROM manufacturing_process WHERE process_name LIKE '%ing%'
SELECT * FROM standard_operating_procedures;
SELECT id, title, last_updated FROM standard_operating_procedures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY description DESC;
SELECT step_name, duration_minutes FROM process_steps WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM procedure_steps WHERE step_order BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM standard_operating_procedures;
SELECT id, title, description FROM standard_operating_procedures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description, created_at FROM manufacturing_processes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT p.name, ps.step_name, ps.duration_minutes FROM manufacturing_processes p INNER JOIN process_steps ps ON p.id = ps.id WHERE ps.duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT sh.id, ps.step_name, sh.completed_at FROM process_steps ps INNER JOIN step_history sh ON ps.id = sh.process_step_id ORDER BY sh.completed_at ASC;
